title: 19. Real Talk: The #1 Thing That Really Divides Us
itunes:title: 19. Real Talk: The #1 Thing That Really Divides Us
description: What is it that really divides us? Is it sex, race, religion, political party, economic class or could it be something else? The truth is, none of those things really divide normal Americans. It’s a hoax used to increase ratings and consolidate power. In today's episode, I talk about the #1 thing that really divides us and what we could accomplish if we were united.
